title: Ping increased after server hardware upgrade
body: Looking for riots help as im pretty sure i have a routing issue. before this server hardware upgrade i was getting 40ping and now im getting a solid 70. i already submitted a ticket but it hasn't been looked at yet. if any riot employee could help please!

replies.body:
Since you've already submitted a ticket, I recommend to patiently wait for a tech specialist to get back to you. They will have the tech skills and logs necessary to resolve your issue. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
I am also from the west coast and ping has increased from 59-63 to constant 77+
Oh wow that is so bad dude! Imagine going from 38-39 to 800-900.
